name: Indicator Alert
short_description: A very useful tool to be used only with oscillators or indicators that have a set range such as the RSI, MACD, ATR, etc. This tool has been surpassed by 'Trigger', look for it in the indicators.

params.title: Indicator Alert x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: Alert Source
params.content: Select the indicator you have on the chart that you want to monitor

params.title: Level Over
params.content: Generally the overbought level, for example, for the RSI might be 80 or 90

params.title: Level Under
params.content: Generally the oversold level, for example, for the RSI would be 30 or 20

params.title: Flag Reset
params.content: The reset level, for example for the RSI if the overbought level is 80 and the value of this parameter is 10 then it will start to reconsider an overbought alert only when it returns to 70

params.title: Alert PopUp?
params.content: You can enable a message box on the computer in use

params.title: Enabled ?
params.content: Enable notifications to a webhook, next parameters must be changed
